Develop Your First iPhone App Today!

So, you have an App idea...but no idea where to get started. Our DEVELOP YOUR FIRST IPHONE APP TODAY! course was made just for you! In 6 hours, you'll go from zero to working iPhone App. We've been teaching this course in-person since 2010, and it's still our most popular.

  • Make your own iPhone app with us in less than 6 hours
  • Be ready for our iOS Advanced Course
  • Difficulty rating: BEGINNER

What You'll Learn

  • How to use the Xcode IDE and iOS SDK
  • Hello World
  • Objective-C language basics
  • User Interface design with Storyboards
  • Connecting multiple views and using Tab bars
  • Importing external images
  • Introduction to MapKit and CoreLocation frameworks

Here are some screenshots of what you will make during the course:

Requirements/Prereqs

  • Mac computer (eg MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, Mac Mini)
  • OSX 10.8.4 (Mountain Lion) or newer
  • Xcode 5 or newer (free download from Mac App Store)
  • No prior programming experience required
  • Suggested: Typing speed of 40 WPM or greater
